thread.title: Appeals court says American can't sue FBI over abuse claims
thread.title_full: Appeals court says American can't sue FBI over abuse claims

title: Appeals court says American can't sue FBI over abuse claims
text: Appeals court says American can't sue FBI over abuse claims Friday, 23 October 2015 (11 minutes ago) A U.S. citizen who claims American officials falsely imprisoned and tortured him for several months in Africa can't sue the FBI agents involved because the conduct took place overseas during a terrorism investigation,... Beck's Beer Settlement Over Deceptive Packaging 00:41 US drinkers of Beck’s beer who thought the American-made brew they were buying was still a fancy, century-old German import can get cash payments under a $20m settlement approved Tuesday in a class-action lawsuit over deceptive packaging. On tap: people with proof they bought Beck’s at retail... Recent related news American says he was falsely imprisoned and tortured for several months in Africa after agents accused him of receiving terrorist training CBS News 51 minutes ago - US Also reported by • FOXNews.com • ABCNews.com You Might Like
